name: Zombie, Smokeplume
description: The Zombie, Smokeplume is a large undead creature that produces smoke and fire, making it a unique threat in combat.
memorable: It can create heavily obscured terrain upon death and has the ability to see through smoke.
goals: To engage and harm adventurers using its abilities.
relations: May serve other chaotic evil undead or be found in areas where fire and chaos are prevalent.
environment: Dark, smoky areas often associated with fires or conflict.
strengths: High hit points and resistance to fire damage, capable of manipulating the battlefield with smoke.
weaknesses: Very low dexterity and mental stats, making it less evasive and less intelligent.
attacks: Primary attack is a slam that deals bludgeoning and fire damage; can also use Smoke Breath to obscure and damage enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Smoldering Death creates a smoke cloud that poisons enemies and obscures vision.
senses: It has firesight, allowing it to see through smoke and fog without penalty.
skills: Has a low perception skill, making it not very aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Immune to fire and poison damage
Can potentially remain standing when reduced to 0 hit points
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep
test_queries: large undead monster that creates smoke
chaotic evil zombie with poison attacks
undead creature immune to fire damage
zombie that obscures the battlefield with smoke
